attributes.action: Adequate information from the councils about refuse collection times
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Adequate information about any changes to service provision should be made available to the service users - us the public.

Recently Sunderland City Council stated that it is not responsible or required to inform the citizens of the City about changes/special arrangements to refuse collection times/days.  This information should be provided to each household as a legal obligation - if this information is not provided compensation should be issued to the citizens.
